page.title: 04THE MIRFIELD REPORTER
page.content: { The Mirfield Reporter}has been published for about 50 years.It is published at Leeds along with the {Dewsbury Reporter,The Morley {Observer,The Heckmondwike Reporter,The {Batley News and The Birstall News} all these are part of{The Yorkshire {Post}and United Newspapers.The {Mirfield Reporter}is produced in Dewsbury.They publish 1 free paper called{The Spen and Calder News. The paper produces 230,048 copies a year at{17p}each.The weekly average of sales is 4,424 for the Mirfield Reporter.The number of Dewsbury Reporters sold in a year is 671,994.The average is 12,961. The newspaper employes 50 people. The main 16 are:1 Journalist who specialises in Mirfield,9 reporters,2 sub-editor,1 editor and 3 photographers.
